2W0083








[solution]		 _____ 2W0084








[solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0081
    • 1. Qf8+ Rg7 2. Qxg7 mate.

    		_____
  • 2W0082
    • 1. Rg8+ and then 2. Qxh7 mate

  • 2W0083
    • simpley 1. Nxf6 and 2. Rxd7+

    		_____
  • 2W0084
    • 1. Rxf7+!! Kxf7 2. Qxd6 wins!

    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0088








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0085
    • 1. Nxh4 Nxd4 2. cd wins a piece

    		_____
  • 2W0086
    • 1. Nf6+ Ke7 2. d5 with a fork.

  • 2W0087
    • 1. Bxe4 dxe4 2. Qg4 wins a pawn.

    		_____
  • 2W0088
    • 1. Qb8+ Kb6 2. Rd6 pins the
    • queen.

    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0092

  • 2W0089
    • 1. Rh4+ Kd3 2. Rxh3+ wins the
    • rook

    		_____
  • 2W0090
    • 1. Bg5 Be7 2. Bxe7 traps the
    • queen.

  • 2W0091
    • 1. Bxe4 Rxe4 2. Nd6 forks two
    • pieces

    		_____
  • 2W0092
    • 1. Nxe5 dxe5 2. d6 traps the
    • bishop

    2W0095








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0096








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0093
    • 1. Qxd8+ Nxd8 (forced) 2. Re8
    • Mate

    		_____
  • 2W0094
    • 1. Rxg7+ and 2. Qa8+ leads to
    • mate.

  • 2W0095
    • 1. Bxf5 Qxf5 (or exf5) 2. Rxd7
    • wins

    		_____
  • 2W0096
    • 1. Qxd7+ and then 2. Nf6 with a
    • fork.

    2W0097








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0098








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0099








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0100








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0097
    • 1. Rxd6 and now if Rxd6 2. Re8
    • mate.

    		_____
  • 2W0098
    • 1. Rf7+ (or Rxd6+!) Rxf7 2. Rd8
    • mate

  • 2W0099
    • 1. e4+ Rxe4 2. Nh6 mate or Rf6
    • mate.

    		_____
  • 2W0100
    • 1. Qa8 b2 2. Qxa5+ is a won
    • endgame.
